TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR201

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Nyt rullende materiel i Usbekistan
EBRD - Ukrainan rautatieyhtiön (UZ) uuden liikkuvan kaluston hankinta
BERS - Nuovo materiale rotabile per UZ
EBRD - Az Ukrán Vasutak (UZ) új gördülőállománya
EBOR - Nové železničné koľajové vozidlá pre Ukrajinskú železničnú spoločnosť
BERD - Noul material rulant pentru UZ
EBRD - Novi vozni park pružnih vozila UZ-a

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Nyt rullende materiel i Usbekistan (UA-Kyiv)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: UZ New Rolling Stock
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice

The above named client intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from, or Grant administered by, the European bank for reconstruction and development ('the Bank') for the above named project. Additional financing details are as follows: a loan from the European bank for reconstruction and development (the Bank), Co-financed, from client's own funds towards the cost of the above named project. The client provides the remaining financing the proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 260 000 000.00 USD, will require the procurement of the following:
— The proposed project will require the procurement of general purpose open freight (gondola) wagons.

Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin on 19.2.2018. Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from/ grant administered by the Bank will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the loan from, or Grant administered by, the Bank will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Client's country. Tendering for this project will be conducted by e-procurement using the EBRD Client E-Procurement Portal (ECEPP). Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should register on ECEPP in order to receive notifications via this link:

Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should register on ECEPP in order to receive notifications via this link:

TI_DOC.P: BERD - Noul material rulant pentru UZ (UA-Kyiv)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: UZ New Rolling Stock
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice

The above named client intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from, or Grant administered by, the European bank for reconstruction and development ('the Bank') for the above named project. Additional financing details are as follows: a loan from the European bank for reconstruction and development (the Bank), Co-financed, from client's own funds towards the cost of the above named project. The client provides the remaining financing the proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 260 000 000.00 USD, will require the procurement of the following:
— The proposed project will require the procurement of general purpose open freight (gondola) wagons.

Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin on 19.2.2018. Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from/ grant administered by the Bank will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the loan from, or Grant administered by, the Bank will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Client's country.
